q_who_to_when_sick.correct: Yes! We go to the doctor when we are sick.
q_who_to_when_sick.wrong: No, that's not where we go when we are sick.

q_who_to_when_fire.correct: Correct! We call the firefighters in a fire.
q_who_to_when_fire.wrong: No, in a fire we should call the firefighters.

q_who_teaches_at_school.wrong: No, at school the teacher teaches.

q_who_brings_letter.correct: Correct! The postman brings the letter.
q_who_brings_letter.wrong: No, the postman brings the letter.

q_who_flies_plane.correct: Yes! A pilot flies the plane.
q_who_flies_plane.wrong: No, they don’t fly the plane.

q_who_cuts_hair.correct: Correct! A barber cuts our hair.
q_who_cuts_hair.wrong: No, they don’t cut our hair.

q_who_cooks_food.correct: Yes! A cook prepares the food.

q_who_provides_milk.wrong: No, it is usually provided by a cow.

q_who_do_we_play_with.correct: Yes! We play with our friend.

q_who_is_sad_about_broken_toy.correct: Yes! The child with the broken toy is sad.

q_who_is_happy_to_see_food.correct: Yes! The hungry baby is happy to see food.

q_who_plows_field_and_grows_vegetables.correct: Yes! The farmer plows the field.

q_who_goes_to_space_in_rocket.correct: Yes! The astronaut goes to space.

q_who_gives_first_aid.correct: Yes! The nurse gives first aid.

q_who_studies_and_learns_at_school.correct: Yes! The student studies at school.

q_what_brush_teeth_with.correct: Yes! We put toothpaste on the brush.
q_what_brush_teeth_with.wrong: No, we don't put that on the brush.

q_what_use_for_soup.correct: Correct! We use a spoon for soup.
q_what_use_for_soup.wrong: No, that is not correct for soup.

q_what_erase_with.correct: Yes! We erase with an eraser.
q_what_erase_with.wrong: No, we don't erase with that.

q_what_dry_after_bath.wrong: No, we don’t dry with that.

q_what_use_to_paint.correct: Yes! We use crayons to paint.

q_what_use_to_tie_hair.correct: Yes! We use a hair clip.

q_what_put_on_birthday_cake_and_blow.correct: Yes! We put candles and blow.

q_what_put_stuff_in_when_going_to_school.correct: Yes! We use a school bag.
q_what_put_stuff_in_when_going_to_school.wrong: No, we don't put them in that.

q_what_is_crispy_snack_made_of_potatoes.correct: Yes! Chips are made of potatoes.

q_what_drink_water_with.correct: Yes! We drink with a glass.
q_what_drink_water_with.wrong: No, we don't drink with that.

q_what_babies_drink_milk_with.wrong: No, they don't drink with that.

q_where_doctors_work.correct: Yes! Doctors work at the hospital.

q_where_go_to_swing.correct: Yes! We go to the playground.

q_where_ships_sail.correct: Yes! Ships sail on the sea.

q_where_cars_go.correct: Yes! Cars go on the road.

q_where_eat_out_with_family.correct: Yes! We can go to a restaurant.

q_where_birds_lay_eggs.wrong: No, they don’t lay them there.
